articles.title: Helldivers 2 Is Letting Players Vote On Which Planet Gets Hit By Its Not-A-Death-Star
articles.title_tr: Helldivers 2 Is Letting Players Vote On Which Planet Gets Hit By Its Not-A-Death-Star
articles.summary: Helldivers 2 prides itself on the concept of Managed Democracy, and in the latest example of crowdsourced decision-making, the game is asking players to choose a planet to blow up with a shiny new not-a-Death-Star superweapon. Fortunately, these planets aren't home to any brave Helldivers and are instead populated by the undemocratic factions that refuse to yield to Super Earth.The latest twist in the Helldivers 2 saga kicked off last week when Super Earth announced that it was upgrading the Democracy Space Station with the Star of Peace weapon. The platform can now fire a "macro-scale laser" optimized for "mass Freedom dispensation" that collapses an entire planet into a black hole.Helldivers players are now being asked to boot up the Democracy Space Station voting panel from their Galactic Map and choose one of three planets: Zagon Prime, Penta, or Valmox. These are held by the Terminids, Automatons, and Illuminate, respectively.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Eski futbolcu Ümit Karan için tutuklama talebi
articles.title_tr: Eski futbolcu Ümit Karan için tutuklama talebi
articles.summary: İstanbul’daki uyuşturucu soruşturmasında gözaltına alınan eski futbolcu Ümit Karan, tutuklama talebiyle sulh ceza hakimliğine sevk edilirken, aynı soruşturmada 22 şüphelinin de adliyedeki işlemleri sürüyor.

Telefonunuz normal şekilde açılmıyorsa veya yazılımsal sorunlar yaşıyorsanız, bu mod hayat kurtarıcı olabilir. articles.title: All Armor Crafting Recipes In Hytale
articles.title_tr: All Armor Crafting Recipes In Hytale
articles.summary: There are few things more important in Hytale than the armor your character equips. Armor can save you from dying to a dangerous mob when you're exploring at night or in a dark cave. It also plays a large part in how your character looks, which does play a factor in your experience if you play in third person. While you might have already figured out how to craft the most basic armor in Hytale, there are several more advanced options that offer stronger protection from mobs.The guide below shows you all of the current crafting recipes we have for armor in Hytale. As a note, some armor that you see in a Creative-mode world might not be available in Survival yet, similar to our guide on all Hytale weapons.Table of Contents [hide]How to craft armor in HytaleHow to craft armor in HytaleA character donning some rare armor in HytaleIf you view your character from the inventory screen in Hytale, you'll see that you have four available slots to equip armor. These slots are for your Helm, Gauntlets, Cuirass, and Greaves. For some reason, there is no dedicated boot slot, but maybe that will be added in a future update. You also have a slot for a shield, but that's not necessarily armor, so we won't be covering those crafting recipes.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: How To Increase Inventory Space In Hytale - Backpack Upgrade Guide
articles.title_tr: How To Increase Inventory Space In Hytale - Backpack Upgrade Guide
articles.summary: Your starting inventory space in Hytale is likely all you need early on. You won't have access to a huge amount of resources or gear yet, so your inventory is plenty for what you need until you build a chest for extra storage. However, as you go along, you'll find more and more materials to pick up, which fills up your inventory quickly. While you might think you'll always be left with the default inventory size, that's not the case in Hytale.How to unlock the backpack in HytaleTo increase the size of your inventory, you need to unlock and use the backpack in Hytale. The backpack is a separate item from the default inventory, but its sole goal is to give you more slots to put items.Fortunately, the backpack is unlocked fairly early on in Hytale, as all you have to do is upgrade your workbench to tier two. You can read about all Hytale workbenches in our previous guide, but getting a workbench to tier two requires the following resources:Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.summary: Korku oyunlarının efsanesi Resident Evil serisi 30 yaşını kutlarken gözler Capcom cephesinden gelecek yeni duyurulara çevrildi. articles.title: How To Use Slumber Islands In Animal Crossing: New Horizons
articles.title_tr: How To Use Slumber Islands In Animal Crossing: New Horizons
articles.summary: One of the big highlights of Animal Crossing: New Horizons' 3.0 update is the new Slumber Islands feature. This feature lets you fully customize additional islands, providing you with more freedom to design than your standard home island. You can also enjoy customizing Slumber Islands with friends. In this guide, we'll explain how to access Slumber Islands and how to use this new sandbox-style feature.The 3.0 update also includes a new Resort Hotel to unlock and a new way to tidy your island with Resetti's Reset Service. We have a complete Animal Crossing: New Horizons guide hub to help you with all of your island needs. The list includes starter tips, details surrounding timed seasonal events, how to complete all the upgrades, and more. Continue Reading at GameSpot

The list includes starter tips, details surrounding timed seasonal events, how to complete all the upgrades, and more. Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.summary: Disney Cory in the House, an obscure Nintendo DS game at the center of a bizarre viral campaign, is now being sold for hundreds of dollars via eBay.

articles.title: Maude Apatow and Kaytranada Light up Rodeo Drive With Bulgari Eternal
